lenders.name: Roberto

lenders.name: Pedro
lenders.occupational_info: I sell automotive tools.

lenders.name: Peter Basso & Family

lenders.occupational_info: Besides having a law degree, I we tend to 400 organic appletrees in Northern California. I also have a daughter who is 18, and a son who is 14.  That's his handsome face in the display picture, he's attempting to eat our dog....:)

lenders.name: Paulo
lenders.loan_because: it doesn't hurt and hopefully helps people across the world improve their life.

lenders.name: Manuel
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a foreign language to corporate students in Portugal

lenders.name: Dina
lenders.loan_because: I was given a loan years ago to accomplish my dream. These hard working,good people deserve the same opportunity. How wonderful that I can help!
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of people who have had surgery.

lenders.name: Norma
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of human beings; their desire to improve their lives and their desire to provide better opportunities for their children. I believe is the responsibility of each individual to help others achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Evaluation and treatment of the criminally insane.

lenders.name: Roderik
lenders.loan_because: I can and do it!

lenders.name: Remco
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a beautiful way of helping fellow entrepreneurs help themselves, in a very personal way.
lenders.occupational_info: I have my own business, I am a designer and webdeveloper. I design and program websites and help other businesses with their identity and communication. I am also a co-founder of a charity:  www.steppingstonesforafrica.org

lenders.name: Diogo
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the national railways. My job deals with all environmental issues that may arise due to the construction, operation and maintenance of railways in Portugal.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: it is a way to reach out and help someone who is trying to improve their life.

lenders.name: Tiago
lenders.loan_because: i live in a part of the world where people have a overall good quality of live. This is just a tinny little thing i can do to balance world money distribution.
lenders.occupational_info: i create software, not the best job i could ever imagine, but i need someway of earning money, and its not that bad afterall...

lenders.name: Ricardo
lenders.loan_because: We can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Teatcher/researcher.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to...

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because:
Acredito que posso fazer a diferença...
I believe I can make a difference...

lenders.name: Alisa & Lane
lenders.loan_because: Because we are also small business owners.

lenders.name: Marya
lenders.loan_because: it's important to me to help others realize their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an English teacher.

lenders.name: Micky
lenders.loan_because: The Kiva model simply works.  My wife and I travel the world on a frequent basis and the need for micro-loans is more crucial than ever!

lenders.name: Elin
lenders.loan_because: It can make a big impact on someones life.

lenders.name: Janna
lenders.loan_because: For the past  5 years I have owned and operated a small, home-based business.  I understand how a small amount of money can make a big difference to people running their own businesses.  I have been blessed with success and want to help others do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I create art on my computer and then print it onto clothing (shirts, hats, etc.).  I then sell the items I create online and in my small retail store.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I want others to succeed in controlling their own destiny.

lenders.name: Betty
lenders.occupation: Notetaker for a student who is a quadraplegic

lenders.name: Jarleif
lenders.loan_because: I want other people to have the possibilities.....

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help, even if only in a small way. I'm a single parent and am especially interested in helping other moms.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in online education.

lenders.name: luisgalveias
lenders.loan_because: I want to give a chance to people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Back in my country I also support entrepreneurs raising capital to their projects.

lenders.name: Felix
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro-financing.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur active in the internet & technology sector.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I understand the value of a dollar
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying agriculture

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: Money is love!

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I think everyone deserves a chance to succeed in life.

lenders.name: Filipe Silva Guerra
lenders.loan_because: Helping people to improve their life´s and set an example to my children.

lenders.name: Laura Lana
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I like to see other people's ideas;  I browse the site even when I am not lending.  Of course it always feels good  when I am able to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work almost every day at a restaurant but I prefer to think of myself as a homemaker!

lenders.name: Rodrigo
lenders.loan_because: I think we all have the need to help and Kiva is a real path. Giving out money will never solve the world's poverty, supporting entrepreneurs may have a chance...

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Maybe I can make a difference and help someone improve his/her life.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: Everyone whom I know already has enough (too-much) "stuff". In the part of the world in which I live we're driven to acquire more and more. I have been blessed to travel internationally and I have come to appreciate those cultures where family and community are "what matters". This is a way in which I can contribute to people of those cultures. Hopefully I can continue to pass it on, a few entrepeneurs at a time. My intention is to add a few more gifts each year and to never stop passing it on.
lenders.occupational_info: My mission in life is: "to create loving, caring, and supportive communities by honoring the diversity and similarities amongst all peoples."

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we all deserve a chance to thrive.

lenders.name: Joanna & Kim
lenders.loan_because: We want to help end world poverty.

lenders.name: Yelena
lenders.occupation: Technical Recruiter for a consulting company
lenders.loan_because: because budget is a huge challenge to meet but should not be the stopping block on the way of the talent and guts of these entrepreneurs
lenders.occupational_info: I discover and hire technical and business consultants for my company. I am also working on my masters degree in Industrial/Organizational Psychology

lenders.name: Rui Filipe
lenders.loan_because: I want to help!

lenders.name: Heman
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro-financing.
lenders.occupational_info: I am interested about how the future is represented in various ways through the imagination of individuals. This is where my work is located.

lenders.name: Monique
lenders.loan_because:
I want to empower women to porvide the best life for themselves. their friends and their families.
I am particularly interested in helping those women who by receiving these loans will be able to provide education for their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a medical device company in North America which sells blood collection tubes to hospitals and physicians offices for diagnostic purposes.  The tubes are specifically designed for use in newborns, children and cancer patients.

lenders.name: Hermann
lenders.loan_because: I believe if we are in a position to help others, we have an obligation to do so. Thanks to Kiva, making a difference is that easy.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm the founder of TUXAMOON, a political, cultural and social platform.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: My long term goal is to be an entrepreneur. I believe helping others establish their businesses is a great investment. It warms my heart to know that the little money I donate helps someone's dream become a reality.
lenders.occupational_info: I sale designer clothing in a store.

lenders.name: VALICIA
lenders.loan_because: I love to make a difference!  This is a way I can help make the world a more beautiful place in every way.
lenders.occupational_info: So much fun!  I just love what I do.

lenders.name: Helen and Simon
lenders.loan_because: We want to help provide opportunities to individuals who dream big and work hard.

lenders.name: Bárbara
lenders.loan_because: To contribute to build a better world.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I care!

lenders.name: Polonca
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I own a small business. We want to help other people set up businesses and improve their lives.

lenders.name: Francis Almeida
lenders.loan_because: It allows those who will not get funded through commerical banks a chance to access funds that allows them a chance to make a life for themselves and their families. We need to help our fellow human beings have a chance at a better life.

lenders.name: Pedia
lenders.loan_because: Our staff is made up of caring people who want to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: Our company works to improve the health of all people, by working with other companies to make better medicines for everyone.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
I read an interview with Moses, an MFI representative in Uganda. He explained how the poorest of the poor do not think of tomorrow because they are so focused on the next morsel they can get for their families. For these people there is no tomorrow, only the challenge of surviving today. These small Kiva loans have so dramatically changed the lives of some people, Moses said "they now think of tomorrow."

Can you give a person anything better than tomorrow?

lenders.name: Chris Bitler
lenders.loan_because: "It makes a difference to someone else!"
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an internal auditor for the consumer goods company Church & Dwight (Arm & Hammer, Trojan, OxiClean, etc.).  I dabble around on the internet in my spare time - buying domains and tinkering with web sites and blogs.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I believe that your quality of life shouldn't be determined by the birth country lottery. Hard-working people given the opportunity can succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I design parts of the phone system.

lenders.name: Ruschele
lenders.loan_because: It just feels good to help those that are trying to help themselves. We all need to help each other out!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a paper pusher!!!!

lenders.name: Vasco
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a better world with more opportunities for people that want to do and change their lifes!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a portfolio manager for Pension Funds and Funds of Funds.

lenders.name: Dean / Gail
lenders.loan_because: We care for people.
lenders.occupational_info: We enable people to love God and others.

lenders.name: 4th Hour Sociology
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others succeed and make our overhead projector proud.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I want to!

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: I owe

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I guess it makes me feel that we really can make a difference.

lenders.name: SocialSoundSystem
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to succeed in a world that has been systematically opposed to developing nations. Damn the Man. Save the Empire.
lenders.occupational_info:
My work is not my life; my work simply supports the life I live.

I love music in all shapes and forms.

I don't want to travel the world... I NEED TO TRAVEL THE WORLD!

You got a couch I could sleep on?

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference. We can do so much, with so little. As I have traveled around the world I become more aware of the waste that goes on in the United States. Less fortunate countries/people need so little to make a huge difference in their lives....we should all help.

lenders.name: Zahra
lenders.loan_because: paying it forward!

lenders.name: JestPaint.com
lenders.occupation: Face Painter and Owner of JestPaint.com
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help other small businesses grow around the world. My husband and I decided to increase our loans to Kiva by adding a portion of our sales from our face paint store to our account. 

We have to be creative when coming up with ways to make a difference in the world. 

We are thankful for other face painters who support our store, and inkind support Kiva Lenders!
lenders.occupational_info: I paint faces and whole bodies for private and public events. I also teach face painting and selling face paints to other artists.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a shot at success, whatever that means to them. For the entrepreneurs asking for assistance here I am very happy to be able to help.

lenders.name: Laetitia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to make a living in tough circumstances
lenders.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer all day

lenders.name: Oliver
lenders.loan_because: I am a one-man business, too

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: Because I know that someone needs the money more than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: Civil Engineer

lenders.name: Ann G
lenders.loan_because: It has always been my dream to start a small business. With this donation I am helping someone to take that step and fly.

lenders.loan_because: We would like to help others succeed.

lenders.occupational_info: a student in the 3rd grade

lenders.loan_because:
Se posso, devo ajudar.
If I can,  then I must help.

lenders.name: Racquel

lenders.name: Francisco CR
lenders.loan_because: I like Kiva lender motivation

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I was given an opportunity to start my own business and things have been going very well for me and my family. I hope that by helping out someone to get started that they can have the same satisfaction and fulfillment I have had.
lenders.occupational_info: I complete environmental assessments and remediation projects in the oil and gas industry in the province of Alberta, Canada

lenders.name: Tami
lenders.loan_because: I was given a KIVA g.c as a gift...which keeps on giving. This is a wonderful opportunity to reach out to those with aspirations who just need a little boost to fulfill them.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a small, family owned, neighborhood tavern that provides great food and spirits to a wide variety of people. Our friendly family atmosphere has earned us a reputation that people have loved and respected for 40 years. Although I have only been a part of it for 12 years, I have met many wonderful people from all over the world and found that everyone has a little kindness in their heart to share.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to try to do my small part to make a big difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Didier
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit and the capacity for us to do good as a world force.

lenders.name: Terry

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: It opens my heart and brings simple joy.

lenders.name: Merek
lenders.loan_because: I once spoke with my parents about how I joined this program, and I referred to Kiva and loans as investments.. My mom quickly corrected me in calling a loan an investment, because Kiva loans have no interest, but that made me realize how much more of a investment this really is.  Kiva has truly surpassed all limitations of monetary and materialistic values...

lenders.name: Lisa E. Dunn
lenders.loan_because: It brings me pleasure and happiness assisting someone else to achieve your fullest potential and purpose in their individual life.
lenders.occupational_info: An entrepreneur that provides life coaching, personal and virtual assistant services.

lenders.name: Brian & Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I feel good attempting to make a difference.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I have a passion for small business and am inspired by the spirit of the people who engage in such ventures.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist with the development of many small businesses under the umbrella of a larger corporation.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed that i am in a position to be able to lend through Kiva.  It feels good to know that even in a small way I am helping make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: As Director, Global Promotions & Branded Foods I am responsible for the implementation of promotions and branded foods in the United States.  I am also responsible for the approval of licensee television advertising on a global basis.

lenders.name: Mary Kathryn

lenders.name: Everything Grows

lenders.occupational_info: We run an interior plant business in the San Francisco  Bay area. For each new customer at Everything Grows we give back by making a donation and loan to a Kiva entrepreneur. It is our way of sharing our success and helping someone else succeed as well.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping someone out if I can.

lenders.name: Jocelyne
lenders.loan_because: I can help almost directly someone else to get a better life

lenders.name: Jillian
lenders.loan_because: My loan will go directly to the people who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with the online service they purchased which is access to movies and pictures of models they like.

lenders.name: Queen of the Click
lenders.loan_because: I love that people have dreams & it's fun to help them get to fulfill dreams. It's awesome to see the successes that people around the world are having with just a little bit of help and their own determination.  Somedays when I am having a bad day, I come on Kiva and it feels great to help others make their dreams come true. My website is here: http://www.queenoftheclick.com
lenders.occupational_info: Kiva allows everyone a chance to realize they can make a difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I save childrens lives.

lenders.name: Matthew A. Cercone
lenders.loan_because:
There is a NEED and I am able 
to afford sharing what financial
means that I have available to
give-back what others have given
to me --- personal PAY-BACK.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am RETIRED and enjoying what
GOD has provided to "me" in this
environment and life-time.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: YOUR GOD LOVES YOU!
lenders.occupational_info: I keep the Peace

lenders.name: Buck and Billie
lenders.loan_because: God has been good to us.  We wish to  help others.  Helping people help themselves makes us happy.
lenders.occupational_info: We enjoy family & friends. Buck is retired.  He takes care of our home, gardens, hunts and fishes. Billie sings in the choir.  We enjoy time with our grandchildren.

lenders.name: Tore
lenders.loan_because: it is an exiting way to contribute to other peoples lives and possibilities.
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate search and rescue-operations when someone is in distress at sea in the air or on land

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because:
Making a difference in someone's life has always been my joy.  I am so happy to be able to help so many wonderful people, who through no fault of their own are not as blessed as we are.  My lifetime goal is to know that "My life mattered and that I made a difference"  Kiva has really helped me to fulfill this goal.
"I am only one, but still I am one.  I cannot do everything, but still can do something.  I will not refuse to do the something I can do"
Helen Keller
lenders.occupational_info: I was a finance executive in the film industry for 40 years.  I retired 2 years ago and now live in Santa Barbara California with my life partner.

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference, I want to pay it forward for all the times I was helped by others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non profit insurance company. I get to pay providers for the health care they give to the less fortunate in my community.  I am proud of the work I do.

lenders.name: Mariana Malta
lenders.loan_because: I deeply believe  in micro-credit as a tool against poverty!
lenders.occupational_info: Information Systems

lenders.name: Agus
lenders.loan_because: others have been so generous towards me.
lenders.occupational_info: I treat water so it is healthy to drink.

lenders.name: Peggy  & Patty
lenders.loan_because: We were brought up in a loving famiy that taught the value of hard work. As business owners ourselves we want our business as well as others to succeed. And then there's Karma.
lenders.occupational_info: We look at real estate titles and check the history of them ro make sure that the title is good and point out any defects.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: Capital is what some people lack in capitalism. Kiva is a win-win.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.occupational_info: I learn!

lenders.name: Marissa
lenders.loan_because: I believe people are capable of so much when given the opportunity and I know that I have the power to give people that opportunity.

lenders.name: Roxanne
lenders.loan_because: I'm building my own "dream" business now.  I realize the struggle and the satisfaction.  Hopefully I can in some small way help people to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a photographer.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference for someone.  I have a lot to be grateful for and for this reason I want to give back to those who may not have had the opportunities that I have had living in Canada.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social worker.

lenders.name: Trish
lenders.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed enough to be able.
lenders.occupational_info: Fire Chief

lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I want to invest in other entrepreneurs.

lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of professional women who meet once per month for lunch to support each other in our careers, decisions, dilemmas, and as friends.

lenders.name: Susanna
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves to live in dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I help smart children from all around the world reach their academic potential.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping those who are driven and determined to create a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Manager of a store that supplies everything needed to paint cars, trucks, boats etc.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world and Kiva makes it so easy to do it for persons of more modest incomes!

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.occupation: studying to be a personal trainer
lenders.occupational_info: studying to help those lose weight, to be healthy active people  :)

lenders.name: Miguel
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes you just have to have a chance... and it feels wonderfull when it finally arrives.
lenders.occupational_info: I've writen and directed for television, and shorts for cinema. I'm now embrassing my first feature film. My goal is one: touch audiences and share emotions with them about human nature.

lenders.name: Helena
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that it's everyone's duty to give a little help to improve the life of those who work hard for it!
And also because I believe that if everyone helps we can achieve a better world.

lenders.name: Addy
lenders.loan_because: I am learning what it means to give to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I play and go to school. My mom and dad make me do chores around the house...sometimes I help with my baby sister.

lenders.name: Katrina
lenders.loan_because: helping small businesses provides security which makes for a more peaceful world.

lenders.name: flags
lenders.loan_because: We are committed to helping different communities from around the world achieve the standard of living that everyone deserves. For more information visit our website www.fiu.edu/~flags
lenders.occupational_info: Flags is a students’ initiative that started as a project for the Honors College at FIU. The main purpose of such project is to foster in our society a greater sense of solidarity for communities from around the world that experience hardships of different kinds, and with which we don’t necessarily identify from a cultural point of view. In this way, the members of Flags, and all those who contribute with our cause, offer immediate support to such communities and demonstrate that by sharing our time and our resources—even if it is only a small portion—we can have a great positive impact in the wellbeing of others who need it.  For more info visit our website www.fiu.edu/~flags

lenders.name: Ronen
lenders.loan_because: it's good for the Karma.... :-)

lenders.name: Koren
lenders.loan_because: I want to help. While traveling in countries where Kiva partners lend I met so many hard working people that I wanted to help but it was logistically difficult. This is such a simple way to make a really profound difference to someone. I am grateful for the opportunity to share in someone else's success.

lenders.name: sandra
lenders.loan_because: operating a small business on my own i  can appreciate  the need for help to get on there own and support them fully in their quest to take care of themsevles and family andnot rely on the government for help

lenders.name: Lura
lenders.loan_because: we want to empower people to be the best that they can be
lenders.occupational_info: we have a small charity that we have set up that involves friends keeping a small jar by their night table and dropping spare change into it, this way the money is not missed but it adds up and is used to make loans

lenders.name: intention
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Oliver
lenders.loan_because: Grrr rrrrr ruff!
lenders.occupational_info: pant pant pant

lenders.name: Duard
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who are in need and I think that is great.  I think everybody who can should loan.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: there are a lot of people out there that need a little help now and again. If I can help get someone get back on their feet while Im able to continue standing on mine then I will do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Aircraft Rescue Firefighter. I am immidate response to any aircraft emergencies that come in on the various airfields I work on around the world.

lenders.name: Sultan
lenders.loan_because: I care. I've been lucky to have more than I need. I'd like to help others reach their goals and needs.

lenders.name: Celina
lenders.loan_because: My family never had money growing up, so I joined the army to support my mom and siblings.  Now that I make good money I want to help out others in need.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: I believe in supporting women owned businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate and execute merchandise presentation and perform inventory management duties for both accessory and apparel companies.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because:
I am lucky.  Born into a loving family and safe community, I have been fortunate enough to always have food to eat, a roof over my head, and access to fantastic educational oppurtunities.

I hope that through these loans lives will be improved.  Every child and adult for that matter, deserves these things: food, shelter, safety, family, and education.
Peace be with you : )
lenders.occupational_info: At this point in my life, I attend school each day learning as much as I can.  For money, I take care of other people's children.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference in people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently in graduate school working towards a PhD in Biochemistry.  I hope to contribute to our understanding of Cancer and Diabetes

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I'd rather spend my money by helping people around the world than buying more stuff I don't really need.
lenders.occupational_info: I write company-wide communications and announcements on behalf of the bank I work for. Additionally, I consult on company strategy and marketing.

lenders.name: david

lenders.name: Ian

It's in my blood.


ianlambm@hotmail.com
lenders.occupational_info: Government

lenders.name: Jaclyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.  There are people in the world who were born into much more unfortunate circumstances than I.  I want to take my opportunity as a more fortunate member of the human race and the global community to help those in need and that are motivated enough to better themselves and thier community.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I love the concept of microfinancing and how it can truly help people out there who want to build their capacity. I know I'm fortunate to have the life I have - I'm not rich, but certainly have a decent standard of living - and I hope to be able to help others attain the same too.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a theatre company and deal with the administrative end of things. It is a theatre company that aims to present innovative, challenging works that touch the heart and mind. I also assist with the curating and organisation of the Fringe Festival here with a team: we focus on a specific theme that is topical each year, and present local and international works from all genres that grapple with the issues arising from the theme.

lenders.name: joseph
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy investing in people, so they can one day hopefully re-invest into other people.

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.loan_because: I hope it will help people, who want to make a difference in their community.

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by entrepreneurs, and one day be counted among them!  I loan to honor another important group in my life- my awesome teaching team!
lenders.occupational_info: I provide creative ideas and environments for children and the adults that love them to play and learn together.  Teachers, parents, caregivers and children are my clients!

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: Imagine what a difference would be made in the world if every person who could afford it gave a mere $25 to help someone less fortunate...
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a recent law school graduate and a full-time freelance writer.

lenders.name: Joon
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of something greater than myself.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.occupation: SAT Tutor and Graduate Student Hopefull
lenders.loan_because: I don't think people should be held back from pursuing their business because of financial difficulty.  If those with means help those without them, both parties can benefit.
lenders.occupational_info: I help students in my local community prepare for the SAT exam for college admission.  I ham hoping to start graduate school in January 2011 for International Relations with a focus in Economics and Development.

lenders.name: Shadilac
lenders.occupation: Purveyor of Ideas - Uplifter of the downtrodden
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to give, and all people on this planet deserve the opportunity to thrive no matter where they are from.  We need to lift each other up, not tear each other down.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to enjoy every second of every day. Time is the most precious resource and waits for no man or woman. Make the most of it.

lenders.name: SomeBrassMonkey
lenders.loan_because:
I loan to allow the entrepreneur to play out their vision or to help turn dreams into reality. 
Kiva
lenders.occupational_info: I often ask myself that same question and always seem to arrive at a different answer. So, today's explanation of my work is that I with other partners operate a relatively small business which develops software for the life sciences. What does all that mean? My work with my partners mainly deals with developing software systems intended to advance medicine and science through our contribution of state-of-the-art software development.

lenders.name: Chisa
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves the chance and golden opportunity to make their dreams real.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach the importance of dance and arts education and believe that the art of creating and sharing will save the world.

lenders.name: Janis
lenders.loan_because: I believe that hard work needs to be supported and that fighting poverty is a global responsibilty that helps in the fight against terrorism and war.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired special education teacher; a former single parent with two grown children and two grandchildren.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: I am the woman in the black shirt in the photo.  I am giving the loans in the names of the family members you see in the photo with me (my husband, my two children, my parents and my grandmother) as part of their Christmas gifts from me.

lenders.name: Hema & Subhash (HandS)
lenders.loan_because: Little drops of water, make the mighty ocean! - We just try to give back by helping others the way we can.

lenders.name: Althea & George

lenders.loan_because: I think microlending is a proven way to change the world for the better.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: We all need each other.

lenders.loan_because: It feels great.

lenders.name: John Cornelius
lenders.loan_because: I have been the recipient of generous gifts in my life and understand just how much a simple gesture of a little money with a lot of love can change a persons world forever!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a safety professional. I ensure that passengers flying on aircraft are not only comfortable but that in the event of an emergency are safely taken care of. I make important decisions that can save peoples lives! I participate in our Republic which is my responsibility as a fortunate citizen of the United States of America. I participate in our world which is my obligation to you! Together we all can create a better world for everyone!

lenders.name: Reza & Katie
lenders.loan_because: Blessings from God are like rivers, they ought to flow from person to person.

lenders.name: Sandra

lenders.name: Pam

lenders.occupational_info:
I help prevent infections in the hospital. 
I also work with Beads of Courage. Beads of Courage uses beads to recognize every treatment, procedure, and event that occurs to a child with cancer. It honors their courage and gives them a voice- a way to explain.

lenders.name: Bryan

Practicing the principle of sharing helps create justice and peace in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I surf with dolphins.

Artistry Cards is a Toronto-based greeting card company with a conscience. We sell unique and high-quality stationery products from greeting cards, notebooks and much more.
We consider the environment when making our products. All our products are made of 100% stock. Envelopes and packaging are 100% recycled stock.
